word:
Again I appeal to you: will you now be zealous and repent? You have shown your zeal in strong words and oppressive measures toward your brethren. Now I beseech you to give evidence of earnest repentance before it shall be forever too late.--Manuscript 18, 1896. ("Danger of Self-Sufficiency in God's Work," May 30, 1895.) 


                                     -443-
